Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class TopicRepository

The TopicRepository class provides methods for interacting with Topics in a quiz application. It uses REST API requests to get, add, update, and delete topics.

AddAsync(Topic, String)

Asynchronously adds a new topic to the API service.

Declaration
public async Task<ApiResponse<Topic>> AddAsync(Topic topic, string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Topic topic

The topic to be added.
System.String authToken

The authentication token to use for the operation.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<Topic>>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result is an ApiResponse of the Topic.

DeleteAsync(Int32, String)

Asynchronously deletes a topic identified by the given topic ID using an specific authentication token.

Declaration

Type Name Description

The ID of the topic to delete.
System.String authToken

The authentication token used to authorize the request.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponseWithNoData>

A response from the API with no data.

Asynchronously updates an existing topic using the provided authorization token.
